LanguageData.hs_aNewClan.scenario.label: A New Clan
LanguageData.hs_aNewClan.scenario.description: A typical rimworld start with an edo period spin.
LanguageData.hs_aNewClan.scenario.summary: villagers set out to start a new clan.
LanguageData.hs_aNewClan.scenario.parts.22.text: This is good land to start out new clan. Will fate see us rule this land, or will we be another name lost to time?
